name: entropy#1
description:
"A consequence of entropy is that certain processes are irreversible or impossible" --Wikipedia

This is a dynamic moving artwork of animating squares those form images that will constantly change form.

The first entropy causes form to change over time, it will never look the same.
The second entropy is your action, you click to change its color.

In reality, we have uncountable entropy, causing constant changing to what around you. It's becoming more and more chaotic. Like how you see this image, at some point it won't look like a box anymore.
